content.text:
Let me analyze the target structures and provide assembly instructions for both constructions shown in the main image.

Left Structure Analysis:
- 4 blocks total
- 3 layers
- Base: Red arch block
- Middle: Green rectangular block
- Top: Blue cube with orange/red triangular roof

Right Structure Analysis:
- 7 blocks total
- 4 layers
- Base: Two green vertical pillars
- Second layer: Yellow horizontal beam
- Third layer: Red and blue cubes stacked
- Top: Yellow semi-circular roof

Assembly Instructions:

Left Structure:
{
Step1: Move block with index 1 (red arch)
Step2: Move block with index 6 (green rectangular block)
Step3: Move block with index 3 (blue cube)
Step4: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular roof)
}

Right Structure:
{
Step1: Move block with index 8 (green vertical pillar)
Step2: Move block with index 8 (green vertical pillar)
Step3: Move block with index 9 (yellow horizontal beam)
Step4: Move block with index 5 (red cube)
Step5: Move block with index 3 (blue cube)
Step6: Move block with index 11 (yellow semi-circular roof)
}

The blocks have been selected to match the exact orientations shown in the dictionary image, with no rotations applied.
